2025-03-22 16:51:26 +0000 Consumer: I have paid for the Spotify premium since a long time, and I just renewed, it says well that my plan will renew in 30 days. But now it says I'm currently on the free version, | 2025-03-22 16:51:32 +0000 Agent: We're gathering your account information.

This will only take a few seconds. | 2025-03-22 16:51:37 +0000 Agent: We can help with your account payments. | 2025-03-22 16:51:38 +0000 Agent: This is the account you're logged in with:

Display name: RRTheGuy

| 2025-03-22 16:51:44 +0000 Agent: What can we help with? | 2025-03-22 16:52:13 +0000 Consumer: Unrecognised payments | 2025-03-22 16:52:19 +0000 Agent: We'll connect you to an advisor! | 2025-03-22 16:52:19 +0000 Agent: To verify you’re the account owner, you may be asked to share a proof of payment (receipt or confirmation email).

Note: Before sharing, hide any sensitive information, e.g. payment card or bank account numbers. | 2025-03-22 16:52:21 +0000 Agent: An advisor is available. Would you like to chat now? | 2025-03-22 16:52:29 +0000 Consumer: Yes | 2025-03-22 16:52:30 +0000 Agent: We appreciate your feedback! As part of our commitment to improving our service, you may receive a survey at the end of this conversation. Please let us know how we did. | 2025-03-22 16:52:30 +0000 Agent: Connecting you now. They can see these messages and will review your query. | 2025-03-22 16:52:51 +0000 Agent: Antonio C is now connected and reviewing your question. They’ll message you shortly. | 2025-03-22 16:52:52 +0000 Agent: Hi there! Thank you for contacting Spotify Support. Let me just check your concern, this will take a few minutes. Please keep this window open so we won't get disconnected. | 2025-03-22 16:53:12 +0000 Consumer: are you fr ? | 2025-03-22 16:54:54 +0000 Agent: I can confirm the account linked to this email address is a Premium Individual account : rr****15@gmail.com ( masked for security ) | 2025-03-22 16:55:34 +0000 Agent: Also you mentioned you're getting unrecognized payments, correct? | 2025-03-22 16:56:01 +0000 Consumer: yes, I paid for it, and its still in free version | 2025-03-22 16:57:01 +0000 Agent: Can you send the screenshot of the account profile page showing you're logged in to the app? | 2025-03-22 16:57:19 +0000 Agent: We need to rule out the possiblity of you having another Spotify account. | 2025-03-22 16:57:37 +0000 Agent: That you might have logged in to by mistake. | 2025-03-22 16:57:45 +0000 Consumer: ok, just wait a minute | 2025-03-22 16:58:11 +0000 Agent: Alright. | 2025-03-22 16:58:32 +0000 Consumer: https://attachments.office.net/owa/rado.razakarivony%40eduvaud.ch/service.svc/s/GetAttachmentThumbnail?id=AAMkADdkMzBjYjJkLTZiMzAtNDkxNC1iMTkyLTFhNDM1YWU2OWZlOQBGAAAAAADn4TUeQH%2BCR5NREhEfqaT1BwAOB2jrvnTDSqX3NdBOnQTRAAAAAAEMAAAOB2jrvnTDSqX3NdBOnQTRAACtHoY%2BAAABEgAQAMI1G9yHZ3FDkyKRpZ4sIq0%3D&thumbnailType=2&..t5NwnZiaTFtymotmCEqb8o3NlQMIcX2igXy1RVhyi0YEKIvkfwQP5FZfuIPtAORpv0TuZuvVq3Kkxp0DXUMPyAKWRBRfrXuS08DHF3cokEwCTiJmiZp1aQvkJFEKhByWYutkZ8F0UatejBqbhjYq-sYh9FZ-boazeotOSx4JdWNYPsqYkeOm_gJY5J0iZd9AfjhNBsk709M8vxZWYsW6nILFODtNky1Kvqt4zsK6sNt8-YMvYxANWwu54YOOIrYhMDDQAtvlHAxLvlFFTFmbE2BNqtYxP2gT5FaTuKdlzvDs3xh9Qk9xTkNUTsWtqeqQRfuXrSM7EsuxL97aZGFBWA&X-OWA-CANARY=X-OWA-CANARY_cookie_is_null_or_empty&owa=outlook.office.com&scriptVer=20250314002.09&clientId=36C02A988DF24B0397D82B303D20120C&animation=true&persistenceId=d383e348-5c88-4f78-9936-109dc41bb7d5 | 2025-03-22 16:58:39 +0000 Consumer: oops sry :( | 2025-03-22 16:58:54 +0000 Agent: It's okay. | 2025-03-22 16:59:14 +0000 Agent: You can resend the correct one. | 2025-03-22 16:59:24 +0000 Consumer: yes i did | 2025-03-22 17:00:01 +0000 Consumer: Did you receive ? Is it what you want ? | 2025-03-22 17:00:11 +0000 Agent: Yes, thank you. | 2025-03-22 17:00:55 +0000 Agent: Can you try to sign out from the app completely and sign bck in again? | 2025-03-22 17:01:04 +0000 Consumer: ok | 2025-03-22 17:01:42 +0000 Agent: It's the same account I'm looking at but for some reasons, it's showing free on your end while on mine it says Premium already. | 2025-03-22 17:01:45 +0000 Consumer: i'm logged out, tell me when i can login | 2025-03-22 17:02:00 +0000 Consumer: oh ok | 2025-03-22 17:02:05 +0000 Agent: Yes, you can log in again please. | 2025-03-22 17:02:35 +0000 Consumer: oh yeah ty it worked :) | 2025-03-22 17:02:44 +0000 Consumer: Tysm ! | 2025-03-22 17:02:46 +0000 Agent: Wonderful! | 2025-03-22 17:02:54 +0000 Agent: May I ask if there's anything else that I can possibly help you with? | 2025-03-22 17:03:00 +0000 Consumer: Seems like it was a bug on my device sry | 2025-03-22 17:03:08 +0000 Agent: I can see that we're all set, correct? Thanks for chatting with me! Would you mind staying on the line for a few seconds after this conversation so we can send you a copy of the transcript for your reference? | 2025-03-22 17:03:30 +0000 Agent: Happy to reunite you to the correct account! | 2025-03-22 17:03:44 +0000 Consumer: Yeah ! Ty, have a good day ! | 2025-03-22 17:03:45 +0000 Agent: Have a good one! | 2025-03-22 17:03:49 +0000 Agent: Question 1 out of 4 Tell us what you think! Did we resolve your issue?
